column1: Uchi////I've been so excited to try Uchi for the longest time
column2: especially after reading all the raving reviews of it on Yelp! But overall
column3: my experience here was pretty lackluster and
column5: paled in comparison to the other Japanese tapas restaurants I've been to in Houston. I have no problem spending a lot on an incredible meal
column6: but I felt there were only a couple dishes here that exceeded my expectations - and when I'm paying as much as we did I want to be wowed.
